description: Additional issuing information for the SAML source.

SAMLResponse.description: SAML Response sent by the IDP.
SAMLResponse.title: SAMLResponse

authURL.description: Contains the auth URL is noAuthRedirect is set to true.
authURL.title: authURL

noAuthRedirect.description: If set, instruct the server to return the SAML auth url in authURL instead of performing an HTTP redirection.
noAuthRedirect.title: noAuthRedirect

redirectErrorURL.description: SAML redirect url in case of error.
redirectErrorURL.title: redirectErrorURL

title: IssueSAML
